name: GoGoSpace!
description:
This is GoGoSpace!, a game by its cover inspired by Nat Morillo's (@natnatart) art submission in Famicase Exhibition 2020

More on Twitter | ottob.it

If you like what you see buy me a coffee

---------

Spyce and GoGo, the robotic pal, are two secret space agents who must defeat all the dangers lurking in the SP-093 galaxy system!

CONTROLS

ACTIONKEYSGAMEPADMove shipLEFT / RIGHTLEFT / RIGHT
FireCTRL / Z / XA / BPauseENTERSTARTResetENTER + SHIFTSTART + BACKFullscreenF-
